#Forest #Forst Since the 1990s, federal / state governments (60% / 40%) have been promoting forest conversion measures: mixed stands appropriate to the location. This includes reforestation / reforestation of damaged areas. Around 15,000 hectares were converted across Germany in 2018.

#Regenwald Deforestation-free supply chains (also for animal feed), trade agreements that exclude deforestation must be complied with or lose their validity. With #climate protection we are all in the same boat. Fatal if forest is proactively destroyed!
